describe.zh_CN: 学者发现所有水晶都有一个频率属性。共鸣培养箱，通过水晶间频率的共鸣，调整生息土壤的频率，一旦频率调整到与某种水晶相同，则会在土壤中萌生出该水晶的「生命精华」。该土壤可以在水晶花园中生长出水晶花。\n（每次水晶花成熟后，「生命精华」都会有一定几率消失)
describe.en_US: Scholars have discovered that all crystals have a frequency attribute. Through resonance between crystals in the Resonance Incubator, the frequency of the Lived Soil is adjusted. Once the frequency matches that of a certain crystal, the 'Essence of Life' of that crystal will sprout in the soil. This soil can grow crystal flowers in the Crystal Garden.\n(After each crystal flower matures, there is a certain chance that the 'Essence of Life' will disappear)
